code: import React,{useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Settings=()=>{const[settings,setSettings]=useState({defaultLocation:'',notifications:false,theme:'light'});const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();try{await axios.post('/api/settings',settings);alert('Configuración guardada exitosamente');}catch(error){console.error('Error al guardar la configuración:',error);alert('Error al guardar la configuración');}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"settings-page",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Configuraci\xF3n"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"form-group",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"defaultLocation",children:"Ubicaci\xF3n Predeterminada"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{id:"defaultLocation",type:"text",value:settings.defaultLocation,onChange:e=>setSettings({...settings,defaultLocation:e.target.value})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"form-group",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("label",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"checkbox",checked:settings.notifications,onChange:e=>setSettings({...settings,notifications:e.target.checked})}),"Activar Notificaciones"]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Guardar Configuraci\xF3n"})]})]});};export default Settings;
